# Import packages and data
```{r}
packages = c('tidyverse','skimr','ggrepel','patchwork')

for(p in packages){
  if(!require(p, character.only =T)){
    install.packages(p)
    }
  library(p, character.only =T)
}
```



```{r}
employer <- read_csv("data/Employers.csv")
head(employer)
```



```{r}
job <- read_csv("data/Jobs.csv")
typeof(unlist(job$daysToWork))
```

ggplot(data = job, aes(job$hourlyRate))
